error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'cents_given_to_randi' (value: 60) was used instead of 'randi_nickels' (value: 12.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 54
Ray gave 30*2 = <<30*2=60>>60 cents to Randi.
Randi has 60/5 = <<60/5=12>>12 nickels.
Peter has 30/5 = <<30/5=6>>6 nickels.
Randi has 60-6 = <<60-6=54>>54 more nickels than Peter.
